alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Weld (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 22 at 10:52AM MDT until June 26 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Denver has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Colorado... South Platte River near Weldona affecting Morgan and Weld Counties. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...South Platte River near Weldona. * WHEN...From this morning to Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, There is widespread lowland and meadow flooding. Irrigation works are impacted. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM MDT Thursday the stage was 7.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 9.1 feet early Sunday morning. - Action stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
